class.name: CylinderMesh
class.description: Class representing a cylindrical [PrimitiveMesh]. This class can be used to create cones by setting either the [member top_radius] or [member bottom_radius] properties to 0.0.

members.member: Bottom radius of the cylinder. Defaults to 1.0.
Full height of the cylinder. Defaults to 2.0.
Number of radial segments on the cylinder. Defaults to 64.
Number of edge rings along the height of the cylinder. Defaults to 4.
Top radius of the cylinder. Defaults to 1.0.
